sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Card, Row, Col, Typography, Timeline, Tag, Space } from 'antd'; import { ExperimentOutlined, RobotOutlined, DatabaseOutlined, NodeIndexOutlined, ApiOutlined, SecurityScanOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import styled from 'styled-components'; const { Title, Paragraph } = Typography; const FeatureSection = styled.div` margin: 40px 0; `; const TechStackSection = styled.div` background: #f8f9fa; padding: 40px; border-radius: 8px; margin: 40px 0; `; const ArchitectureCard = styled(Card)` height: 100%; transition: transform 0.3s ease; &:hover { transform: translateY(-4px); } `; function AboutPage() { const features = [ { icon: , title: 'Multi-Agent AI System', description: 'Specialized AI agents work together like a research team, each with unique expertise in data retrieval, extraction, synthesis, and validation.' }, { icon: , title: 'Advanced Vector Search', description: 'Domain-specific embeddings using BioBERT and semantic search for precise document retrieval from scientific literature.' }, { icon: , title: 'Knowledge Graphs', description: 'Neo4j-powered knowledge graphs capture complex scientific relationships and enable advanced reasoning.' }, { icon: , title: 'Self-Correction Loop', description: 'Generator-Critic pattern ensures hypothesis quality through iterative validation and improvement.' } ]; const techStack = [ { category: 'Orchestration', items: ['LangGraph', 'LangChain', 'FastAPI'] }, { category: 'AI Models', items: ['GPT-4o', 'Claude', 'BioBERT', 'SciBERT'] }, { category: 'Databases', items: ['Neo4j', 'ChromaDB', 'PostgreSQL', 'Redis'] }, { category: 'Frontend', items: ['React', 'Cytoscape.js', 'D3.js', 'Ant Design'] }, { category: 'Infrastructure', items: ['Docker', 'Prometheus', 'Grafana', 'AWS/GCP'] } ]; const architecture = [ { title: 'Data Ingestion', description: 'Scientific papers and datasets are processed and stored in vector databases with metadata indexing.', components: ['Semantic Scholar API', 'PubMed', 'PDF Processing', 'Text Chunking'] }, { title: 'AI Processing', description: 'Multi-agent system processes documents through specialized AI agents for extraction and synthesis.', components: ['RAG Agent', 'Extraction Agent', 'Synthesis Agent', 'Critic Agent'] }, { title: 'Knowledge Graph', description: 'Extracted entities and relationships are stored in Neo4j for advanced graph-based reasoning.', components: ['Entity Extraction', 'Relationship Mapping', 'Graph Algorithms', 'Path Discovery'] }, { title: 'Hypothesis Generation', description: 'LLMs generate novel hypotheses based on retrieved knowledge and graph relationships.', components: ['Prompt Engineering', 'Chain-of-Thought', 'Self-Correction', 'Validation'] } ]; return (
<ExperimentOutlined /> About S The State-of-the-Art Biomedical Discovery Engine (SABDE) is an AI-powered research assistant that generates novel research hypotheses from scientific literature using advanced multi-agent systems, knowledge graphs, and large language models. Key Features {features.map((feature, index) => ( {feature.icon} {feature.title} {feature.description} ))} Technology Stack {techStack.map((category, index) => ( {category.category} {category.items.map((item, itemIndex) => ( {item} ))} ))} System Architecture {architecture.map((layer, index) => ( {layer.title} {layer.description}
Components: {layer.components.map((component, compIndex) => ( {component} ))}
))} How It Works 1. Query Processing User submits a research question or topic of interest.
) }, { children: (
2. Document Retrieval RAG agent searches vector database for relevant scientific papers and abstracts.
) }, { children: (
3. Entity Extraction BioBERT-based extraction agent identifies genes, proteins, diseases, and other biomedical entities.
) }, { children: (
4. Knowledge Graph Building Extracted entities and relationships are stored in knowledge graph.
) }, { children: (
5. Hypothesis Generation Synthesis agent uses LLMs to generate novel, testable research hypotheses.
) }, { children: (
6. Validation & Refinement Critic agent validates hypotheses and triggers self-correction loop if needed.
) } ]} /> Research Applications
  • Drug discovery and repurposing
  • Disease mechanism identification
  • Biomarker discovery
  • Pathway analysis
  • Treatment optimization
  • Patient stratification
  • Clinical trial design
  • Precision medicine
 Future Enhancements
Advanced AI
  • Graph Neural Networks
  • Reinforcement Learning
  • Multi-modal AI
Privacy & Security
  • Homomorphic Encryption
  • Federated Learning
  • Secure Multi-party Computation
Scalability
  • Cloud-native Architecture
  • Distributed Processing
  • Real-time Updates
 ); } export default AboutPage;
